CustomField.formula: IF( AND(NOT(ISBLANK(Contact.Phone)), NOT(ISBLANK(Contact.MobilePhone))), Contact.Phone & "/" & Contact.MobilePhone, IF( NOT(ISBLANK(Contact.Phone)), Contact.Phone, IF( NOT(ISBLANK(Contact.MobilePhone)), Contact.MobilePhone, "" ) ) )
CustomField.label: Telefone/Celular do contato
